Room.Name: Finesse's Second Hand Shop
Room.ShortDescription: You have entered the shop of a retired old drunk, Finesse the thief.
Room.LongDescription: Although retired from the adventuring business, Finesse still likes to stay in touch with his old friends. Many of them drop in here to laugh and share a drink, and tell lies about their exploits. Occasionally, Shadowhawk and Sisyphus are here, and Finesse's cousin Fin even stops by sometimes.
